root.name: The Haunted: Hells Reach
root.description: OverviewOfficial DescriptionAll Hell Has Broken Loose!!! The Haunted is a fast paced third person action horror game that focuses on delivering an intense multiplayer experience. Your goal is to liberate cursed places and survive the assault from the minions of Hell. The game features several multiplayer modes such as co-op survival, demons vs. humans and demonizer.The Haunted: Hells Reach is an independent third person shooter game coming to the Steam, Xbox Live Arcade and Playstation Network in 2011. It is the direct successor to an Unreal Tournament 3 mod called The Haunted which won the 2009 Make Something Unreal contest. It has a strong focus on cooperative gameplay that involves up to four players working together to fight off various types of demons in large, open maps.Main FeaturesEight different maps.Twenty enemy types.Four playable characters.Tiered weaponry that allows you to upgrade weapons into similar stronger ones. For example, the knife upgrades into the chainsaw which in turn upgrades into the witch hammer which finally upgrades to the glaive.Four game modes.Level events that significantly affect the gameplay. Confirmed examples are meteor showers and lightning storms.Game ModesThe game features three primary game modes that are intended to be played in multiplayer, as well as a single player mode.Survival - One player fights against increasingly difficult waves of demons.Inferno - Up to four players fight against increasingly difficult waves of demons.Battle - Four human players fight against four player controlled demons.Demonizer - Identical to inferno until a player dies. That player then becomes a demon and fights against the humans until either a timer runs out or every human has become a demon.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7Processor: Intel Pentium Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.8GHzMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Shader Model 3.0 graphics card with 256MB of memory (NVIDIA GeForce 7900GS, ATI Radeon 2000 series or higher) DirectX 9 compatibleHard Drive: 4GB of free hard drive spaceSound: DirectX compatible sound card
